mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, username, password, nick_name, avatar, sex, phone, memo, open_id, union_id, last_login_ip, last_login_time, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{avatar}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{memo}, #{openId}, #{unionId}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{status})
